phrases.Description for the Airbnb Plus marketin: A new selection of only the highest quality homes with hosts known for great reviews and attention to detail.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.page_title: Airbnb Luxe | Luxury villa and luxury home vacation rentals
phrases.luxury.landing_page.page_description: 2,000 verified villas, homes and vacation rentals to book from on Airbnb. View photos, property details, rates and prices on luxury villas and rental homes.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_1_subtit:
From vineyard estates in the Tuscan countryside to secluded villas in Bali, 
every Airbnb Luxe home has been carefully vetted to ensure it’s the perfect destination.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_1_1_subt: Statement-making homes with exceptionally styled interiors.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_1_2_subt: Fully equipped to meet your needs, with ample space and privacy.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_1_3_subt: Each property is verified for pristine condition and meticulously maintained.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_2_subtit: When you book with Airbnb Luxe, you’re connected with a dedicated trip designer who’s there to craft your five-star stay, even down to securing a table at a Michelin-starred restaurant.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_2_1_subt: Your trip designer can plan every last detail and make sure everything is just right.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_2_2_subt: Private airport pick-up, an in-person welcome, and a home stocked with your must-haves.
phrases.luxury.landing_page.value_props_2_3_subt: From personal chefs to massage therapists, a local team of professionals has you covered.

phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_account: Let’s add a photo of you
Before you book, let’s add your ID
Let’s add your ID
We’ll then check that you’re really you by matching this new photo (not your profile photo) with the picture in the ID you already added.
A government ID helps us check that you’re really you—you’re staying in someone’s home, after all.
It also helps us keep Airbnb secure, fight fraud, and more.
A government ID helps us check that you’re really you.
After adding a photo of your ID, we’ll then quickly match the picture in your ID with a new photo you’ll take of yourself.
We’ll ask you for a photo of your ID, and you’ll only do this once.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_identity_fov.gov: It turns out we couldn’t use the last 4 digits of your Social Security number for this last step. So you’ll need to add an ID instead.
And while we’re helping you take care of that, no one else can make a reservation at Rita’s place for the dates you selected.
We appreciate you spending the extra time adding your ID and helping make Airbnb even more secure.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_account: Your photo will never be shared with a guest.
Your ID will never be shared with a guest.
Your photo will never be shared with guests.
Your ID will never be shared with guests.
Your photo will never be shared with other people on Airbnb.
Your ID will never be shared with other people on Airbnb.
Your photo will never be shared with a host.
Your ID will never be shared with a host.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_identity_errors_: It’s difficult to see your ID clearly in the photo you added. To help us make sure it’s you, we’ll need a clear photo of your ID.
Add a clearer photo of your ID
Once that’s done, you’ll be all set to unlock your account.
There was a problem with the photo of your ID
There was a problem with the photo you took of yourself
One more step to confirm your ID belongs to you
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_monorail_5axiom_profi: %{host_first_name} requires all guests to have a profile photo. They won’t be able to see your photo until your booking is confirmed.
Make sure your photo shows your face and doesn’t include any personal or sensitive info.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_account: How would you like to add a photo of your ID?
You can either take a new photo of your government ID, or upload an existing one from your mobile device or computer.
Which type of ID would you like to add?
It needs to be an official government ID.
Almost done! Now let’s confirm this ID is yours
We’ll have you take a new photo of yourself, so we can match it with the photo in your government ID.
How would you like to take a photo of yourself?
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_experience_pdp.contac: Send a message to find out more about this experience.
Contact %{host} to check availability for dates and times not listed, or if you want to book for a large group.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_experience_pdp.availa: Looks like this Experience is sold out.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_phone_v: You can also use WhatsApp to verify your phone number.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_mt_expe: You can add more friends to this experience and confirm your reservation.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_luxury_messaging.chat: Sorry, messaging isn’t available at this time. Please try again later.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_luxury_messaging.side: Every Airbnb Luxe home includes a personal trip designer, who coordinates your arrival, departure, and everything in between. Trip designers are available in English.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_luxury_messaging.inbo: Call to speak with your Trip Designer.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_luxury_messaging.nux_: Trip designers plan every detail of your trip.

When you travel with Beyond, you unlock complimentary access to a team of experts who get to know what you like so they can recommend and arrange things you will love. Tell us more about what you want for your trip. We are here to help.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_nearby_: Things to do near this home
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_p4_caus: This allows clients to access and use their accounts.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_instant: To book %{host_name}’s place, choose from these options:
Verify your ID to book instantly
This is the fastest way to confirm your booking. Your ID won’t be shared with anyone, and you won’t need to do this again until it expires.
Send a request to book %{host_name}’s place
You won’t need to verify your ID, but it may take up to 24 hours to confirm your booking. There’s a chance someone else could book it during this time.
We are confirming the information you provided.
This may take up to 2 minutes. You may continue booking but you won’t be able to submit for payment until your information has been verified.
You have successfully verified your ID!

phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_select_: A woman carefully arkkranges furniture and bread.
Introducing
Introducing Airbnb Plus
All the comforts of home, plus more
Watch the film
Thoughtfully designed homes. Exceptional hosts. Verified for quality.

Airbnb Plus is a selection of only the highest quality homes with hosts known for great reviews and attention to detail.%{paragraphBreak}Every home is verified through in-person quality inspection to ensure quality and design. Just look for the %{select_badge} badge.
Thoughtful design
Every %{select_program_name} home is one-of-a-kind, thoughtfully designed, and equipped with a standard set of amenities—whether you’re in a private room or have the entire place to yourself.
In-person quality inspection
Each Airbnb Plus home is verified for quality and design to ensure they have all of the essentials to make you feel at home—no matter where you are in the world.
Lilian Jin’s entire condominium in Shanghai
Airbnb Plus homes are where high quality meets carefully considered design—down to every last detail. With elegant design and personal character, the homes are as welcoming as they are beautiful.
A brown leather couch with a soft blanket and square pillows sits in a blue room with rustic paintings and decorations on the walls.
Thoughtfully designed
Filtered or bottled water
Cooking essentials including oil, utensils, and servingware
Iron and hairdryer
Matt’s entire guesthouse in Los Angeles

You can expect a consistent set of amenities you need to live like you do at home–from fast wifi and televisions ready for streaming to full kitchens with all the cooking essentials. A few of the other things you’ll get:%{paragraphBreak}
A white and wooden kitchen is neatly arranged with lemons, glass pitchers, and ceramic saucers.
Well-equipped
All appliances are in working order
Functional locks on all bedroom doors in shared spaces
All spaces are neat and tidy
Rob’s entire house in Cape Town

%{select_program_name} hosts take the extra effort to ensure the home is extra clean, clutter-free, and fully functioning–from manicured outdoor spaces to tidy bathrooms with strong water pressure. A few of the other things you’ll get:%{paragraphBreak}
A modern, stone and glass home sits in a sunny landscape with a still, blue pool at its doorsteps.
Well-maintained
Exceptional hosts
Airbnb Plus hosts are highly rated (4.8+), accommodating, and take care of the details that make you feel at home—like soft linens and fully equipped kitchens.
Reliable check-in
With %{select_program_name}, you can always check in effortlessly. Every home is equipped with a lockbox, keypad, or a host who is on-call to greet you.
Premium support
When you book an %{select_program_name} home, you get the focused attention of our %{select_program_name} customer support team–a highly-trained team committed to great service and faster responses.
Find the perfect %{select_program_name} home for your next trip
Just look for the %{select_badge} badge under the listing photo.
Airbnb Plus homes around the world
From beachside bungalows in Los Angeles to sublime teahouses in Kyoto, explore Airbnb Plus homes verified for quality and design.
Show all homes
Explore Airbnb Plus homes in San Francisco
Allyson’s entire house in San Francisco

A nook spotlit by a small red pendant lamp. The wall is covered by a black-and-white wallpaper pattern. A slab of wood mounted on either side of the nook acts as a desk, topped by framed artwork and small objects and sculptures. Tucked beneath the desk are three yellow metal stools.

The bright living room, with a focal point on the large bay windows, record player, and a white leather and wood chair with matching ottoman. A large record collection spans the right wall, and on the opposite wall is an upright piano, door, and tropical plant.

A living room with wooden floors and tall windows. Main focal points include a textured rug and a large record collection against the back wall. Framed music posters hang on the walls, and there are three cushioned armchairs of various sizes and textures.
Explore Airbnb Plus homes in Sydney
Tonia’s entire home in Sydney

A wooden pool deck flanked by tropical plants and trees. Steps lead into a swimming pool partially lined in small turquoise tiles, and a hot tub built into the base of the deck is accompanied by two yellow chairs, a white umbrella, and potted plants.

Light-filled, mid-century modern style living room with a vaulted ceiling, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a sliding glass door that opens to an outdoor area. In the background are windows, a stone fireplace, and a wall-mounted TV. The floor is covered by a cowhide rug and the room is furnished with a leather chair and ottoman.
Bright corner of a bedroom with white walls, framed artwork, and a small bedside table. White drapes partially cover floor-to-ceiling windows, one pane of which is slightly opened.
Explore %{select_program_name} homes in London
Fern’s entire house in London
Detail shot of a room showing a wall with light blue wallpaper, wall-mounted mirror, and a white fireplace mantle topped by candleholders, and a red vase with fresh flowers

A living room with blue walls, red patterned curtains, and other colorful touches that complement the wooden floors and white furnishings. In the center of the room is an unlit fireplace, and to the right is a window nook with throw pillows. In the foreground is a glass table with a vase of sunflowers.
Window light fills a carpeted corner with drapes and a plush upholstered chair accented with a floral pillow and blanket. A case of fresh-cut flowers sits on top of a wooden side table.
Explore %{select_program_name} homes in Los Angeles
Matt’s entire guest house in Los Angeles
A woven hammock chair hangs from the ceiling near a small window and a door leading to an outdoor area. Above the window on the wooden wall to the right hangs a triangle flag garland.

A spacious sleeping area with high ceilings, wood-slatted walls and windows. On the right is a bed, and to the left is a metal staircase that leads to what looks like a second level. The floor is covered by a large woven rug and at the back of room is a sliding glass wall that opens to a private patio with an outdoor fireplace.
A high wooden fence provides privacy for the small outdoor patio, equipped with two woven chairs and an outdoor fireplace.
Explore %{select_program_name} homes in Toronto
Rush’s private room in Toronto

A wooden table with a decorative centerpiece of a cow skull partially wrapped in sisal rope and a pair of half-melted wax candles in brass candlesticks. Hanging just above the skull are several strands of lightweight chainmail, possibly parts of a ceiling light or chandelier. In the backdrop, sunlight streams through the window trimmed by a white curtain.

A living room with matte, charcoal-colored wall panels and a white textured rug. In the center of the room is a round glass coffee table surrounded by a grey couch and two plush armchairs. Photos and taxidermy are mounted on the walls and the windows are flanked with long white curtains.

In the living room is a panelled wall mounted by a piece of framed artwork. In the foreground we see the left edge of a gray couch, and a wood side table covered with books, an old-fashioned Brownie camera, and small sculptural objects.
Explore %{select_program_name} homes in Shanghai
Lane’s entire house in Shanghai
A decorative bust and two geometric glass terrariums rest on top of a modern wooden dresser. The dresser is pushed against a light pink wall on which a framed piece of abstract art is hung.

A blue-walled bedroom with wooden floors covered by a large area rug. To the right is a curtain-trimmed window. Dominating the room is a wooden four-poster cube bed flanked by two wooden side tables with small lamps. A plush armchair sits in one corner closest to the bed, and in the opposite side of the room is a full-length mirror and wooden clothing rack.

A blue ceramic teapot and matching tea cups are stacked atop a wooden table next to a stylish box of tissues and an amber glass vase with fresh flowers. In the background is a plush armchair and a drape-covered window.
Explore %{select_program_name} homes in Milan
Costanza’s entire loft in Milan

A modern bedroom equipped with a bench at the base of the bed topped with folded white towels and an open-theme wardrobe with shelves, drawers, and a rod to hang clothes. A large woven pendant lamp hangs from the rustic wooden ceiling, and along the back wall is a mid-sized mirror and a leather seat.

Leafy palm, fern, and ivy plants adorn a gray glass-and-steel exterior wall with an entry into an indoor dining area. Through the door is a room with a green-tiled wall, a woven area rug, and a woven pendant lamp hanging above a wooden dining table set with a glass carafe full of water.

A small leafy houseplant in a terra-cotta planter sits on top of a thick, red-bound hardcover book on a cork stool. The stool is up against a green-tiled wall, and in the background around the corner is a polished cement-lined hallway leading through a wrought-iron framed glass door.

phrases.legacy_mario.mario_p2_p3_abandon_login.l: Check your email! We sent a link to %{tag_start}%{email_address}%{tag_end} to help you log in instantly.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_fapiao.fapiao_co: There is an additional 6% charge for getting a Fapiao, and you will receive your Fapiao after the end of the journey.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_fapiao.modal_sub: The right information can help you receive your Fapiao more quickly. Please confirm that the information is correct and the Fapiao information cannot be modified after the order is submitted.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_fapiao.fap_title: What is the difference between electronic ordinary Fapiao, paper ordinary Fapiao and VAT special Fapiao?
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_fapiao.fap_conte: The electronic Fapiao is the product of the information age. Like the ordinary Fapiao, it is used by the tax bureau in the form of uniform distribution. The Fapiao number is uniformly coded nationwide, unified anti-counterfeiting technology is distributed to the merchant, and the electronic Fapiao is attached to the electronic Fapiao. Signature mechanism. On the basis of the upgraded version of the VAT invoice system, the State Administration of Taxation organized and developed the VAT electronic Fapiao system. After the preliminary pilot, the system operated smoothly and had the conditions for national implementation. It was decided to implement it nationwide from December 1, 2015.

The electronic Fapiao is still on paper. Only the previous Fapiao is a quota or is issued according to the need, so there will be a big tail. The electronic Fapiao obligor keeps the blank Fapiao on its own, enters the data through the Internet, and then issues it to the customer. So as to eliminate some management loopholes and prevent tax evasion.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_luxury_p4.lux_ve: Enter a phone number your Trip Designer can use to contact you during your trip. We’ll send you a text message with a confirmation code.

We’ll send you a text message with a confirmation code.

phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_luxury_p5.p5_hea: This reservation has expired. Feel free to book again or reach out to a trip designer for assistance.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_luxury_p5.p5_bod: Now that you know where you’re staying, a Trip Designer can book experiences and services. Everything will be organized into an itinerary designed around you and your destination.
Thank you for paying the first part of the total. We’re holding your reservation but full payment still needs to be made to confirm it.
A Trip Designer will be in touch within 72 hours to confirm availability for %{propertyName}
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_luxury_retreats_cance: Luxury Retreats hosts can choose one of the cancellation policies below for their listing. You’ll see a listing’s cancellation policy in the Cancellations section of the listing page.

For German listings, hosts should make sure that the non-refunded amount provided to a guest who cancels does not exceed the expected damages. Guests can request a partial refund if they can show that the non-refunded amount exceeds the host’s loss or damages. %{link_start}Learn more%{link_end}.
Airbnb listings have a %{link_start}separate set of cancellation policies%{link_end}.

Trips start at 3pm in the listing’s local time on the date of check-in, regardless of the guest’s scheduled check-in time, and all pre-trip cancellation periods are calculated based on this cut off time.

A reservation is only officially canceled once the guest follows the steps on the Luxury Retreats cancellation page and receives confirmation. You’ll find the cancellation page in the %{link_start}Your Trips%{link_end} section of the Luxury Retreats site and app.
Airbnb service fees are not refunded for cancellations.
Hospitality fees are always refunded for cancellations made before 3pm in the listing’s local time on the scheduled check-in date.
Non-refundable deposit amounts vary by listing. The specific amount can be found in the “Non-refundable deposit” section of the listing.

Luxury Retreats will refund any taxes we collect that are related to amounts refunded to guests, and will submit any taxes due on the non-refundable portion of canceled reservations to the appropriate tax authority.

If a guest has any issues with a host or listing, they must contact their Villa Specialist within 24 hours of check-in to be eligible for a full or partial refund under our %{link_start}Guest Refund Policy%{link_end}.

A host’s cancellation policy is subject to, and may be overridden by, the %{link1_start}Guest Refund Policy%{link1_end}, the %{link2_start}Extenuating Circumstances Policy%{link2_end}, or cancellations by Luxury Retreats for any other reason permitted under the %{link3_start}Terms of Service%{link3_end}.
Airbnb has final say in any dispute between hosts and guests regarding the application of these cancellation policies.
phrases.legacy_mario.mario_luxury_cancellation_p: Airbnb Luxe listings are managed by Luxury Retreats and hosted by Property Management Companies or private owners. Luxury Retreats hosts can choose one of the cancellation policies below for their listing. You’ll see a listing’s cancellation policy in the Cancellations section of the listing page.

If you can prove that the amount withheld by the host in accordance with the cancellation policy is greater than the actual losses incurred by the host or that the host has not suffered any losses at all, you are entitled to a partial or full refund of the amount withheld by the host. %{link_start}Learn more%{link_end}.
Airbnb listings have a %{link_start}separate set of cancellation policies%{link_end}.

Trips start at 3pm in the listing’s local time on the date of check-in, regardless of the guest’s scheduled check-in time, and all pre-trip cancellation periods are calculated based on this cut off time.

A reservation is only officially canceled once the guest follows the steps on the Airbnb cancellation page and receives confirmation. You’ll find the cancellation page in the %{link_start}Your Trips%{link_end} section of the Airbnb site and app.
Airbnb service fees are not refunded for cancellations.
Hospitality fees are always refunded for cancellations made before 3pm in the listing’s local time on the scheduled check-in date.
Non-refundable deposit amounts vary by listing. The specific amount can be found in the “Non-refundable deposit” section of the listing.

Luxury Retreats will refund any taxes we collect that are related to amounts refunded to guests, and will submit any taxes due on the non-refundable portion of canceled reservations to the appropriate tax authority.

If a guest has any issues with a host or listing, they must contact their trip designer within 24 hours of check-in to be eligible for a full or partial refund under our %{link_start}Airbnb Luxe Guest Refund Policy%{link_end}.
Airbnb has final say in any dispute between hosts and guests regarding the application of these cancellation policies.

phrases.legacy_mario.mario_copy_monorail_deposit: Your default payment method will be automatically charged on the second payment date.

We’ll send a reminder 3 days before the next payment.  If there are any problems with this payment, we’ll email you. If we are unable to collect the remaining balance, the reservation will be canceled, and you’ll be refunded based on the host’s cancellation policy.%{lineBreak}%{lineBreak}Read the Pay Less Upfront %{link_start}Terms%{link_end}.

When you use a credit card or PayPal to book an eligible reservation, you’ll have the option to pay part of the total now, and the remaining amount closer to the check-in date, with no additional fee.
